content:
BamlLocalizationDictionary Class

Definition

Contains all the localizable resources in a BAML record.

In this Article

public sealed class BamlLocalizationDictionary : System.Collections.IDictionary
Inheritance
Object
BamlLocalizationDictionary

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Examples

The following example demonstrates how to use a BamlLocalizationDictionary. 


// Obtain the BAML stream.
Stream source = entry.Value as Stream;

// Create a BamlLocalizer on the stream.
BamlLocalizer localizer = new BamlLocalizer(source);
BamlLocalizationDictionary resources = localizer.ExtractResources();

// Write out all the localizable resources in the BAML.
foreach (DictionaryEntry resourceEntry in resources)
{
    BamlLocalizableResourceKey key = resourceEntry.Key as BamlLocalizableResourceKey;
    BamlLocalizableResource value = resourceEntry.Value as BamlLocalizableResource;
    Console.WriteLine(
        "    {0}.{1}.{2} = {3}",
        key.Uid,
        key.ClassName,
        key.PropertyName,
        value.Content
        );                                
}


' Obtain the BAML stream.
Dim source As Stream = TryCast(entry.Value, Stream)

' Create a BamlLocalizer on the stream.
Dim localizer As New BamlLocalizer(source)
Dim resources As BamlLocalizationDictionary = localizer.ExtractResources()

' Write out all the localizable resources in the BAML.
For Each resourceEntry As DictionaryEntry In resources
	Dim key As BamlLocalizableResourceKey = TryCast(resourceEntry.Key, BamlLocalizableResourceKey)
	Dim value As BamlLocalizableResource = TryCast(resourceEntry.Value, BamlLocalizableResource)
	Console.WriteLine("    {0}.{1}.{2} = {3}", key.Uid, key.ClassName, key.PropertyName, value.Content)
Next resourceEntry

Remarks

The dictionary contains a mapping from resource keys (specified as BamlLocalizableResourceKey objects) to resource values (specified as BamlLocalizableResource objects).

XAML Text Usage

Constructors

BamlLocalizationDictionary()

Initializes a new instance of the BamlLocalizationDictionary class.

public BamlLocalizationDictionary ();

Properties

Count

Gets the number of localizable resources in the BamlLocalizationDictionary.

public int Count { get; }
Value
Int32

The number of localizable resources.

IsFixedSize

Gets a value that indicates whether the BamlLocalizationDictionary object has a fixed size.

public bool IsFixedSize { get; }
Value
Boolean

Always returns false.

IsReadOnly

Gets a value that indicates whether the BamlLocalizationDictionary object is read-only.

public bool IsReadOnly { get; }
Value
Boolean

Always returns false.

Item(BamlLocalizableResourceKey)

Gets or sets a localizable resource specified by its key.

public System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResource this[System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey key] { get; set; }
Parameters
key
BamlLocalizableResourceKey

The key value of the resource.

Value
BamlLocalizableResource

The value of the resource.

Keys

Gets a collection that contains all the keys in the BamlLocalizationDictionary object.

public System.Collections.ICollection Keys { get; }
Value
ICollection

A collection that contains all the keys in the object.

RootElementKey

Gets the key of the root element, if it is localizable.

public System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizableResourceKey RootElementKey { get; }
Value
BamlLocalizableResourceKey

The key of the root element, if it is localizable. Otherwise, the value is set to null.

Remarks

You can set some properties for the entire page by adding or modifying the properties of its root element, due to the effects of property inheritance for dependency properties. For example, changing the root element's FlowDirection property sets that property for every element on the page.

Values

Gets a collection that contains all the values in the BamlLocalizationDictionary.

public System.Collections.ICollection Values { get; }
Value
ICollection

A collection that contains all the values in the object.

value

key is null.

ArgumentException

An item with the same key already exists.

Deletes all resources from the BamlLocalizationDictionary object.

The resource key to find.

Boolean

true if the BamlLocalizationDictionary object contains a resource with the specified key; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

key is null.

CopyTo(DictionaryEntry[], Int32)

Copies the contents of a BamlLocalizationDictionary object to a one-dimensional array of DictionaryEntry objects, starting at a specified index.

public void CopyTo (System.Collections.DictionaryEntry[] array, int arrayIndex);

The starting index value.

Exceptions
ArgumentOutOfRangeException

arrayIndex is less than zero.

ArgumentException

arrayIndex exceeds the destination array length.

-or-

Copy cannot fit in the remaining array space between arrayIndex and the destination array length.

Returns an enumerator that iterates through the BamlLocalizationDictionary.

Returns

Removes a specified localizable resource from the BamlLocalizationDictionary.
